content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This logon name was earlier used in Active Directory. It has format DOMAIN\\\\FirstName_LastName and has length restriction: 20 symbols. Password: user's domain password.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Domain depends on user's location. Important! We have restricted number of domains and new ones are no more created. If new location is added, it is referred to the domain, which physically is nearest to this location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example: pre-Windows 2000 logon name of user John Dow from London would be BUDAPEST\\\\John_Dow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case user's name in the form FistName_LastName is longer than 20 symbols, exceeding symbols should be simply removed at the end.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example: for the user Emiliya Nevmerzhytska (21 symbol) from Lviv Pre-Windows 2000 logon name would be KYIV\\\\Emiliya_Nevmerzhytsk (without a: 20 symbols).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The best way to check user's pre-Windows 2000 logon name is to view it on Account tab in Active Directory, further details will be provided in Task Reviewing User's domain account: AD Properties: Account Tab.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
